text: Swissporarena is a football stadium in Lucerne, Switzerland and is the home stadium of FC Luzern. It has a capacity of 16,800 people and was opened in 2011. It replaced the demolished Stadion Allmend. == Other websites == * Official website of Swissporarena * Official website Category:2011 establishments in Switzerland Category:Football stadiums in Switzerland Category:Lucerne
title: Swissporarena
